metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5766 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Libav through 12.2, there is an invalid memcpy in the av_packet_ref function of libavcodec/avpacket.c. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) via a crafted avi file.

notes.Note: ebarretto> No fix available as of 2019-03-01

criterions.comment: libav package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
